form.SN:
v ameriški angleščini pišemo
practice, practices, practicing, practiced
.

sense.def:
To practise something
pomeni nekaj redno delati, da bi bili v tistem boljši.

seg.quote: I played the piece I had been practising for months.
The baseball team was practising in the park.

sense.def:
To practise a custom, craft, or religion
pomeni sodelovati v dejavnostih, ki so povezane z določenim običajem, obrtjo ali vero.

seg.quote: These crafts were practised by many early cultures.
They have managed to practise their religion for years.

sense.def:
To practise medicine or law
pomeni ukvarjati se z medicino ali pravom.

seg.quote: He's in Hull practising medicine now.
